column4: Is there any way I can prevent users from writing to shared folders to avoid exceeding disk quotas?
there is quota support, or you can just revoke the write permissions
I'm using bindfs to create shared folders, and users are able to use up all of the disk space. I want users to be able to write files.
Thanks for the link. I'm using bindfs, so that sounds like it be possible to create a filesystem, set the appropriate permissions, and go.
